official_title: A bill to establish the Protection Island National Wildlife Refuge, Jefferson County, State of Washington.
short_title: Protection Island National Wildlife Refuge Act

summary.text: Protection Island National Wildlife Refuge Act - Directs the Secretary of the Interior to establish the Protection Island National Wildlife Refuge, Jefferson County, State of Washington.
